steps.name: ubuntu
args:
apt update && apt install -y git openssh-client && \
         mkdir -p ~/.ssh && \
         echo "$SSH_PRIVATE_KEY" > ~/.ssh/id_rsa && \
         chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa && \
         ssh-keyscan github.com >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts && \
         git clone git@github.com:mjs-network/devops.git && \
         cd devops && \
         ls -l
